channel.title: Go Humble! RSS SOFTWARE
channel.description: Awesome RSS Feeds about HumbleBundle software bundles!

item.title: Opus FX: Superior Plugins & Orchestral Elegance
item.content:encoded: Elevate your productions to new heights with Opus FX: Superior Plugins & Orchestral Elegance. This bundle unites cutting-edge audio plugins with a sweeping collection of orchestral samples, empowering you to craft breathtaking cinematic scores, rich soundscapes, and dramatic compositions. Perfect for music producers, composers, and sound designers who want to add professional polish, depth, and emotion to their projects, whether you’re scoring a film, producing epic trailers, or creating immersive game soundtracks. Make your magnum opus and support One Tree Planted with your purchase.

item.title: The Ultimate SFX & VFX Bundle
item.description: Turn up the volume with powerful assets
item.content:encoded: Crank up the volume on your next game or creative project with The Ultimate SFX & VFX Bundle. Create the perfect audio-visual vibe with this massive library of royalty-free assets—featuring 100+ sounds and effects, from realistic medieval combat clinks and clanks to spot-on gunfire and more. Pay what you want for the tools you need to dial in your project’s SFX & VFX—and help support the Breast Cancer Research Foundation with your purchase!

item.title: The Unreal Engine Asset Mega Bundle
item.description: Unreal value. Unreal assets. Unreal results.
item.content:encoded:
Calling all game developers—we’ve got an awesome collection of Unreal goodies for you! Get The Unreal Engine Asset Mega Bundle and bring life to your next adventure with stylized asset packs like the Modern Art Museum Environment, American Village house, and Modular Amsterdam City Street. Get the pro-quality assets you need to help bring your next Unreal Engine project to life, and help support Direct Relief with your purchase!

This bundle is redeemed via FAB and includes a Professional License, plus over 4500 meshes for your next project!

item.title: Pro Animation Bundle
item.content:encoded: Calling all animators—it’s time to level up your digital toolbox! Prepare to be blown away by the ultimate animation bundle from Graphixly LLC! Pay what you want for the Moho Pro 12.5 Bundle featuring 100 Brushes Content Pack, Characters Content Pack, and School Days Content Pack. Take your skills from novice to pro in no time and help support No Kid Hungry with your purchase.

item.title: The Complete Defold Course Bundle
item.content:encoded: Learn everything you need to know about building original games with The Complete Defold Course Bundle! Create your own original console, desktop, mobile, and web games using Defold—one of the most powerful and free dev engines around! Hone your skills with approachable courses like Make a Fully-Fledged 2D Action RPG in Defold, Build a Complete 2D Platformer in Defold, Make a Farming RPG from Scratch with Defold, and more. Get the knowledge you seek from the experts at Zenva Academy, and help support NPower with your purchase!

item.title: Become a 3D Environment/Prop Artist - Mega Tutorial Bundle
item.content:encoded: Curious about advanced game development and creation? Then become a 3D environmental artist with our latest Mega Tutorial Bundle! Get hot courses and asset packs like the Japanese Environment pack, Large Game Environment Creation guide, Creating Low-Poly Stylized 3D Weapons course, and more. Learn how to build beautiful cherry blossom fields, develop open-world maps, and manipulate low-polygon assets for added style. Pay what you want for professional-quality tools and help support Special Effect with your purchase!

item.title: Becoming a C++ and Unreal Game Developer by Packt
item.content:encoded: Learn how to create video games in Unreal Engine and C++ from the pros at Packt with our latest Humble Video Learning Bundle. Master modern game development with comprehensive courses designed to help you succeed quickly—like Creating Stunning Environments in Unreal Engine 5 – A Game Artist Bootcamp and Complete Modern C++. Get the expert education you seek from the professionals at Packt, and help support Alzheimer's Research UK with your purchase!

item.title: Miniac presents An Intergalactic SkullForge STL Bundle
item.description: Models from galaxies far, far away
item.content:encoded: Passionate about printables? Miniac presents the Intergalactic SkullForge STL Bundle. Pay what you want and get 20+ hot figure sets that bring life to your games—spend hours perfecting your own playables then show them off to your friends! Print, paint, and customize your own model figures from galaxies far, far away. Add new companions to your collection and help support Oceana with your purchase!

item.title: MEGA MIX Unity Asset Store Pack
item.content:encoded: Dive into our latest Humble Software Bundle and add hot new assets to your next game or creative project! The Unity Asset Mega Mix Bundle offers 25+ outstanding asset packs bursting with style. Pay what you want and get amazing asset packs like the Modular Castle & Dungeon pack, Blood Effects Pack, Mystify FX pack, and more. Get the professional-quality assets you need to help bring your game to life, and help support Girls Who Code with your purchase!

item.title: The Complete Python, Machine Learning, Bots and AI Mega Bundle+
item.content:encoded: Looking to break into data science or land your first data engineering role? This exclusive bundle is your complete toolkit for building a job-ready portfolio using Python, Pandas, and Scikit-Learn! Ideal for beginners and career-switchers—every lesson is practical, approachable, and focused on real outcomes. Actively learn from hands-on projects that mirror the challenges faced by real-world data professionals. Get hot courses that’ll prepare you for the field like today and help support The American Cancer Society with your purchase!

item.title: Big Bang Unreal & Unity Asset Packs Bundle ( 75 Products )
item.content:encoded: Calling all game devs—build your worlds with this gigantic bundle of over 5000 assets, including realistic and stylized environments, SFX packs, and powerful tools. Perfect for hobbyists, beginners, and professional developers alike, you'll gain access to essential resources, tutorials, and beta-testing–ready content to start building immediately. The experts at Leartes Studios have curated an amazing library packed with value, featuring environments, VFX packs, and tutorial courses on Unreal Engine, Blender, Substance Painter, and ZBrush. Get the assets you need to bring your game to life—and help support One Tree Planted with your purchase! This bundle provides Unity Asset Store keys directly with your purchase, and FAB keys via redemption through Cosmos, if the product is available on those platforms.
